data.name: Trainz 2022 DLC - Canadian Rocky Mountains Ottertail to Castle Jct
data.detailed_description:
This route starts in the west, from the Canadian Rocky Mountains Beavermouth to Ottertail route's eastern end, and runs through to the south of Castle Junction.

The famous U spiral tunnels lead you through the Continental Divide, Lake Louise, Eldon Siding onto Castle Junction siding and industries.

Each segment/route brings you closer to Calgary.

Mountain and Glacier lovers alike will be amazed by steep challenging grades through spiral tunnels along wild running creeks in a pristine breathtaking high altitude mountain environment.
data.about_the_game:
This route starts in the west, from the Canadian Rocky Mountains Beavermouth to Ottertail route's eastern end, and runs through to the south of Castle Junction.

The famous U spiral tunnels lead you through the Continental Divide, Lake Louise, Eldon Siding onto Castle Junction siding and industries.

Each segment/route brings you closer to Calgary.

Mountain and Glacier lovers alike will be amazed by steep challenging grades through spiral tunnels along wild running creeks in a pristine breathtaking high altitude mountain environment.
data.short_description: Drive the picturesque Ottertail to Castle Junction section of the Canadian Rocky Mountains railway, travelling through the famouse U spiral tunnels!
data.supported_languages: English, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3GHz 64Bit Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 430 or better/ AMD ATI 5550 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
